member.name: M:ValorProfsApi.Controllers.ProductsController.Get
member.summary: Returns the list of all Products, with the basic information about the products.

member.name: M:ValorProfsApi.Controllers.ProductsController.Get(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns all informations about the product with entered id.

member.name: M:ValorProfsApi.Controllers.ProductsController.Post(ValorProfsApi.Dtos.ProductToCreateDto)
member.summary: Inserts the entered product in the DB.

member.name: M:ValorProfsApi.Controllers.ProductsController.Put(System.Int64,ValorProfsApi.Dtos.ProductToUpdateDto)
member.summary: Modifies the product with the entered id, after the modification the product will equal to the entered value.

member.name: M:ValorProfsApi.Controllers.ProductsController.Delete(System.Int64)
member.summary: Deletes the product with the entered id from the DB.
